title: S14 Ep70: The Next Generation of Ghost Hunters
itunes:title: The Next Generation of Ghost Hunters
description:
Fifteen years after introducing the world to the field of authentic paranormal investigation, Ghost hunters returned to TV on A&E this past week. The team is now led by Grant Wilson and features a brand new cast of paranormal investigators! BEYOND The DARKNESS got the privilege to sit down and talk to Brandon Alvis and Mustafa Gatollari about their paranormal histories, investigation techniques, and what it is like to work on this historic series!
